pages.text: A rock is a loyal, devoted pet that can easily be trained to protect you and your family.$(br2)Pet rocks will respond to the $(bold)Attack$() command in two ways. $(br2)If the threat is nearby, rocks will strike at attackers.$(br2)If the threat at a distance, rocks can be aimed and thrown at the target.

In many areas owners may be held responsible for the actions of their Pet Rocksâ„¢.$(br2)When teaching your rock to $(bold)Attack$() be aware that you may face criminal charges due to the actions of your pet.
